pr_title: [IOTDB-433] Add iterators to TVList to prevent data copy

timeline.bodyText: put this to clone method of TVList
timeline.author: qiaojialin

timeline.bodyText: remove the sortedList field in this class and unused import
timeline.author: qiaojialin

timeline.bodyText:
I suggest using one ReadOnlyMemChunk to store one chunk in a memtable. The TsFileProcessor return a Pair<List, List>
Init the chunk metadata in the constructor in this class and cache it.
Therefore, we only need one chunkreader, and it should not be a mergereader, we could directly get the  IPointReader in TVList.
In the AbstractMemTable, the version should be init by Long.MAX_VALUE for a working memtable, the memtable version is set only when it comes to a  flushing memtable.
timeline.author: qiaojialin

replies.bodyText: this is a pretty nice design
replies.author: liutaohua

timeline.author: qiaojialin
qiaojialin

timeline.bodyText:
If we use a List , this class should not be changed.
is this a bug before?
